job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Amify is a twotime Inc 500 award winner AmazonasaService AaaS provider that offers brands an endtoend Amazon solution that maximizes sales and profitability Amifys datadriven fullservice solution includes strategy advertising creative management and operations for brand protection content enhancement sales acceleration and inventory management We are uniquely positioned to help our brands achieve greater sales margins through the Amazon ecommerce platform Amify has partnered with over 1000 brands of all sizes to manage over 100 million in sales on AmazonltbrgtltbrgtWe are seeking a Software Engineer who will contribute to the delivery of a wide variety of software projects across Amifys entire technology stack from operational systems such as Salesforce to database and reporting platforms and custombuilt web apps and servicesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtResponsibilitiesltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtDeliver highquality architecturally sound code extending and building range of projects and initiativesltligtltligtParticipate in architecture coding and delivery of developed systemsltligtltligtParticipate in iterative interaction with customers from precoding of relevant professional experienceltligtltligt2 years cloud software engineering experienceltligtltligtProven delivery experience on a multifunctional team delivering web mobile distributed and verbal skillsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtWhat Youll Get Out Of ItltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtEnjoy a fun fastgrowing entrepreneurial companyltligtltligtBe part of a highly collaborative learning culture share knowledge be inclusive learn and grow together Embrace teamworkltligtltligtKnowing your ideas are heard and matter Think bigltligtltligtYou get to own your job and be recognized for your
